results.title: Addition of Amlodipine or Valsartan for Improvement of Diastolic Dysfunction Associated with Hypertension
results.text_hl: Addition of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@Amlodipine@@@ or @CHEMICAL_Valsartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068756 @@@Valsartan@@@ for Improvement of @<m>DISEASE_Ventricular_Dysfunction_Left</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018487 @@@Diastolic Dysfunction@@@ Associated with @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@Hypertension@@@

citations.NLM: Oh JK, Seo JS, Park YH, Park JH, Lee SA, Lee S, Kim DH, Song JM, Kang DH. Addition of Amlodipine or Valsartan for Improvement of Diastolic Dysfunction Associated with Hypertension J Cardiovasc Imaging. 2020 Jul;28(3):174-182. PMID: 32462829

results.title: S-AMLODIPINE AS A MODERN EFFECTIVE ANTIHYPERTENSIVE AND AN ANTIANGINAL AGENT.
results.text_hl: We reveal that treatment of @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Coronary_Artery_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D003324 @@@coronary artery disease@@@ with @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@S-amlodipine@@@ leads to improvement of @<m>DISEASE_Ventricular_Dysfunction_Left</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018487 @@@LV diastolic dysfunction@@@, bringing it closer to normal values.

citations.NLM: Chopei IV, Chubirko KI, Bychko MV, Hechko MM, Kedyk AV, Kogutych II. S-AMLODIPINE AS A MODERN EFFECTIVE ANTIHYPERTENSIVE AND AN ANTIANGINAL AGENT. Wiad Lek. 2023;76(11):2429-2434. PMID: 38112360

results.title: Effects of Antihypertensive Treatment on Left and Right Ventricular Global Longitudinal Strain and Diastolic Parameters in Patients with Hypertension and Obstructive Sleep Apnea: Randomized Clinical Trial of Chlorthalidone plus Amiloride vs. Amlodipine
results.text_hl: We tested whether or not diuretics differ from @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ in their impact on echocardiographic parameters.

citations.NLM: Jorge JA, Foppa M, Santos ABS, Cichelero FT, Martinez D, Lucca MB, de Oliveira GPF, Fuchs FD, Fuchs SC. Effects of Antihypertensive Treatment on Left and Right Ventricular Global Longitudinal Strain and Diastolic Parameters in Patients with Hypertension and Obstructive Sleep Apnea: Randomized Clinical Trial of Chlorthalidone plus Amiloride vs. Amlodipine   J Clin Med. 2023 May 31;12(11):. PMID: 37297980

results.title: Treatment for beta-blocker poisoning: a systematic review.
results.text_hl: However, it is reasonable to have a graduated response to @DISEASE_Cardiovascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D002318 @@@cardiovascular instability@@@ beginning with intravenous fluids, commencement of a single or a combination of @CHEMICAL_Catecholamines @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002395 @@@catecholamine@@@ inotropes and vasopressors depending upon the type of haemodynamic compromise (@DISEASE_Bradycardia @DISEASE_MESH:D001919 @@@bradycardia@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Ventricular_Dysfunction_Left</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018487 @@@left ventricular dysfunction@@@, vasodilation).

citations.NLM: Rotella JA, Greene SL, Koutsogiannis Z, Graudins A, Hung Leang Y, Kuan K, Baxter H, Bourke E, Wong A. Treatment for beta-blocker poisoning: a systematic review. Clin Toxicol (Phila). 2020 Oct;58(10):943-983. PMID: 32310006

results.title: Azelnidipine plus olmesartan versus amlodipine plus olmesartan on arterial stiffness and cardiac function in hypertensive patients: a randomized trial
results.text_hl: To compare the long-term effects of @CHEMICAL_olmesartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:C437965 @@@olmesartan@@@ combined with either @CHEMICAL_azelnidipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:C061679 @@@azelnidipine@@@ or @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ on central blood pressure (CBP), left @DISEASE_Ventricular_Fibrillation @DISEASE_MESH:D014693 @@@ventricular@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Ventricular_Dysfunction_Left</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018487 @@@LV@@@) mass index (LVMI), @<m>DISEASE_Ventricular_Dysfunction_Left</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018487 @@@LV@@@ diastolic function (e' velocity, E/e' ratio, E/A ratio) and arterial stiffness (brachial-ankle pulse wave velocity [baPWV] and augmentation index normalized for a heart rate of 75 bpm [AIx]).

citations.NLM: Takami T, Saito Y. Azelnidipine plus olmesartan versus amlodipine plus olmesartan on arterial stiffness and cardiac function in hypertensive patients: a randomized trial Drug Des Devel Ther. 2013;7():175-83. PMID: 23662047

results.title: Amlodipine in ischaemic left ventricular dysfunction with mild to moderate heart failure.

results.title: Chronic amlodipine treatment during the development of heart failure.
results.text_hl: With @DISEASE_Heart_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@CHF@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Ventricular_Dysfunction_Left</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018487 @@@LV stroke@@@ volume remained reduced and was associated with a 40% reduction in myocardial blood flow during treadmill exercise, whereas chronic @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ treatment normalized @<m>DISEASE_Ventricular_Dysfunction_Left</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018487 @@@LV stroke@@@ volume and improved myocardial blood flow.

citations.NLM: Spinale FG, Mukherjee R, Krombach RS, Clair MJ, Hendrick JW, Houck WV, Hebbar L, Kribbs SB, Zellner JL, Dodd MG. Chronic amlodipine treatment during the development of heart failure. Circulation. 1998 Oct 20;98(16):1666-74. PMID: 9778333
